summary: Works, legend and murders of Carlo Gesualdo, a notorious Italian composer and murderer from the 16th century.
cast: Pasquale D'Onofrio|Salvatore Catorano|Angelo Carrabs|Milva|Angelo Michele Trorriello|Raffaele Virocolo|Vincenzo Giusto|Giovanni Iudica|Walter Beloch|Principe d'Avalos|Antono Massa|Alan Curtis|Gennaro Miccio|Silvano Milli|Marisa Milli|Gerald Place|Werner Herzog
title: Tod für fünf Stimmen
